description:
Awesome: spending more time in the gym or outside. Not awesome: smelling like a locker or an outhouse. Where typical laundry options will mask issues with brighteners or scents, Active Wash actually removes the dirt, sweat and foul smells, restoring your favourite tech gear to its high-performance freshest. It even boosts wicking ability and improves drying time, so you can wash less and work out more.

  • Removes dirt, sweat, natural oils and odours
  • Reduces drying times by maximizing wicking performance
  • Effective at low wash temperatures
  • Suitable for use on garments made from merino wool, polyester, cotton and spandex
  • Use 30ml per wash
  • PFAS-free formula
  • 100% recycled container is made from post-consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Active Wash 750ml
